tib256_engine

Class GameItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • tib256_engine.GameItem

  • public class GameItem
extends java.lang.Object
    GameItem object this object represation the actor objects. Actor objects act,show on the window.

    • Method Detail

      • setImage

        public void setImage(java.lang.String filename)
        You can settings your GameItem picture
        Parameters:
        filename - example: "images/picture1.png"

      • setImageCutPiece

        public void setImageCutPiece(java.lang.String name)
        You can settings your GameItem picture , you can draw a piece of a picture.
        You have to setting the sourceX,sourceY,destX,destY parameters.

        Example: You have a big picture and in the picture there are a lot of character , you can draw just a character. You can give the piece of picture lefttop positions(sourceY and sourceX) and rightbottom positions(destX,destY).
        Parameters:
        name - example: "images/picture1.png"

      • setAnimationImage

        public void setAnimationImage(java.lang.String name)
        You can setting the animationImage.
        You have to setting width,height,rows and columns variables.
        Parameters:
        name -

        public void text_write(java.lang.String text,

                       int fontSize)
        You can draw text on the window
        Parameters:

        x - this is x position of the text
        y - this is y position of the text
        fontSize - this is the font size of the text in pixel
